DOC.brief_summary: Determine antidepressant treatment guide pharmacogenetic algorithm interpretive report improve outcomes compare standard treatment without availability genetic information .
DOC.detailed_description: This study design evaluate clinical impact pharmacogenetic ( PGx ) -directed treatment , guide interpretive , algorithmic report Pine Rest outpatient behavioral health clinic . The PGx algorithm utilize study foundation novel method interpret genetic test result report rapidly deliver format provide enhanced guidance psychiatrist selection antidepressant medication
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis Major Depressive Disorder ( 296.2 , 296.3 ) Depressive Disorder NOS ( 311.0 ) board certify psychiatrist . The patient refer study treat psychiatrist nurse practitioner approve study investigator make subject referral study . The patient outpatient imminent need inpatient hospitalization medical psychiatric reason . Patient 's baseline 17Item Hamilton Depression ( HAMD17 ) Rating score > 14 . Provide copy physical exam report perform within 6 month prior study enrollment undergo physical exam either personal physician , physician subinvestigator study , studycontracted physician assistant internal medicine . Undergo medical history include review major organ system either treat clinician , subinvestigator physician , studycontracted physician assistant internal medicine . The patient sign study inform consent form . Serious medical illness ( ascertained via inclusion criterion 6 7 , ) . Diagnosis Bipolar Disorder . Diagnosis Schizophrenia Schizoaffective disorder . Evidence history , baseline urine drug screen , and/or psychiatric interview active abuse alcohol and/or drug abuse within 6 month prior study enrollment . Patients occasionally use marijuana may still eligible determined psychiatric interview level use qualify abuse , dependence , addiction . Patients test positive opioids benzodiazepine eligible evidence abuse determine take opioid analgesic benzodiazepine prescribe licensed prescriber medical psychiatric indication . History prior pharmacogenomic testing .
